snippet: The N.B.A. salary cap has been set for next season at $70 million, a higher-than-expected number that paves the way for free-agent contracts to be signed.
abstract: NBA sets 2015-2016 salary cap at $70 million, 11 percent increase and highest salary cap in history.
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. salary cap has been set for next season at $70 million, a higher-than-expected number that paves the way for free-agent contracts to be signed.
